[conjecture_answer] Formal Problem Statement: import Mathlib

open Nat Real Filter

noncomputable abbrev omnimath1156_answer : ℝ × ℝ := sorry
theorem omnimath1156 :
    ∀ (E : ℕ → ℝ), 
    (∀ k, E k = if k ≤ 0 then 0 else 1 + (E (k-1) + E (k-2))/2) → 
    Tendsto (fun n => E n - omnimath1156_answer.fst * n - omnimath1156_answer.snd) atTop (nhds 0) := by sorry. Enumerated answers: n	E(n)	E(n)/n	E(n)-2n/3
